=====================================

Recently, BestRP has gone even more downhill and sealed it's fate. 
With purlek running around trying to hide the fact that he's an abusive little prick, let us share this torrent as best as possible.
The goal here is not to fuck up purlek. It's to expose the fact that he is a fuck up.
Contact anyone you know whom has made a donation and get them to chargeback and dispute.

Of around $1100 from July 1st to October 6th, roughly $475 was spent on personal expenses.
